doc.after: Mesoamerica refers to a geographical cultural historical region a territory bounded approximately to the north by the Tropic of Cancer across the present day central and western Mexico states and down through the Isthmus of Tehuantepec and the Yucat n peninsula to Guatemala Belize western Honduras El Salvador Nicaragua and northwestern Costa Rica
